attributes.background: Give grants for newly self employed people like taxi drivers &many other self employed

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Extend income replacement schemes to those who don't currently qualify: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560845

Provide a grant for newly self-employed as they have done in Northern Ireland: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/568075

The 2021 Budget announced that there would be a fourth grant under the Self-Employment Income Support Scheme (SEISS), which will be available to people who have filed a 2019-20 Self Assessment tax return: https://assets.publishing.service.gov.uk/government/uploads/system/uploads/attachment_data/file/966161/Budget_2021_Web_accessible.pdf
